name: Nano Ninja
description:
*Don't press space. It calls some function that won't work in the browser*If the game loses focus and doesn't respond click on the blue border. Controls Keyboard Layout A Keyboard  Layout B Xbox Controller Movement A/D Left/Right Arrows D-Pad Jump J X A Attack K C X

Jump towards a wall to automatically grab it. Jump again to release. Climb a wall by holding the direction of the wall while jump/grabbing.

Credits

Code: marclurr

Art: marclurr

Sound effects: marclurr (made on Pico-8)

Music: https://www.zapsplat.com
